title: Trying to reconnect
body: I keep getting a "Trying to reconnect" messege in client, it happens about once a minute and prevents me from accepting matches or even showing the accept. It keeps me in queue for several minutes after the queue was canceled by a party member and its a real issue. Does someone have a fix?

replies.body:
Anytime you see that trying to reconnect message and can't ever join matches, it's a pretty good sign that your network is having a hard time talking with our servers. For some reason, your network isn't able to get the notification that a match has been found so you don't ever see the enter lobby button. 

Go through our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and the steps there should be able to help. Let me know if you have any questions.

Hi, BROPORO. Not 100% related but my friend has been having problems connecting to games. After champ select he gets disconnected and the reconnect button shows up but does not actualy allow him to reconnect. He has tried running the in-client repair and reinstalling but is still having issues. I did not know if there was any network fixes or such that he could try. Thanks!
